summary: Consume the Stripe API to perform various operations like getting balance, adding or removing customer cards, and more.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Balance, Charge, Customer).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Get, Add, Remove).

parameters.name: customer id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to be associated with the card (applicable for 'Add' operation).

parameters.name: card token
parameters.description: Token representing sensitive card information (applicable for 'Add' operation).

parameters.name: customer id
parameters.description: ID of the customer whose card to remove (applicable for 'Remove' operation).

parameters.name: card id
parameters.description: ID of the card to remove (applicable for 'Remove' operation).

parameters.name: customer id
parameters.description: ID of the customer whose card to retrieve (applicable for 'Get' operation).

parameters.name: source id
parameters.description: ID of the source to retrieve (applicable for 'Get' operation).
